1370: Radewijns moved to Paternoster straetje.B.2 after marriage.
Got married to Gertrudis at age 27 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Woltwigis, at age 27.
1371: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Marcibilia, at age 28.
1373: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Lutghardis, at age 30.
1375: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Tetta, at age 32.
1377: Had a son with Gertrudis, Herbert, at age 34.
1378: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Breghlent, at age 35.
1383: Had a daughter with Gertrudis, Sarre, at age 40.
1385: Lost son Hollander when Hollander was 0 years old.
Gertrudis gave birth to their stillborn son Hollander in 1385.
1386: Had a son with Gertrudis, Maelkin, at age 43.
